price: گەر پەروەردگارت بیویستایە گشت خەڵکی دەکرد بە (پەیڕەوی) یەک ئاین بەڵام ئەوان بەردەوام جیاوازدەبن
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka lajaʿala al-nāsa ummatan wāḥidatan walā yazālūna mukh'talifīna
